name: cat
source:
function(env, args){var read_file = function(filename){$.ajax({url : 'content/' + filename,dataType : 'text',success: function( data ){env.push_output('
' + data + '
');}});};var read_link = function(link_href){window.open(link_href);};if(args.length == 0)env.push_output('usage: cat [filename]');else{var pushed = false;for(var i = 0; i < env.file_informations.length && !pushed; i++){if(env.file_informations[i]['filename'] == args[0]){if(env.file_informations[i]['type'] == 'file'){read_file(env.file_informations[i]['filename']);pushed = true;}else if(env.file_informations[i]['type'] == 'link'){read_link(env.file_informations[i]['destination']);pushed = true;}else{env.push_output('cat: Unknown file format');pushed = true;}}}}}
